titles.title: Blessed Lord, Lead Me To The Mountain Top

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed Lord, lead me to the mountain top,
To that land where milk and honey flow.
I will no more ignore thy Love-filled beckoning.
Take my hand, I'm ready now to go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To, to go,
And count all things as loss.
To know, to know,
The dealings of the Cross!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blessed Lord, lead me to the mountain top.
Take my hand, I'm ready now to go.
